title: Irish bacon and cabbage soup
ingredients: ['225g (1/2 lb) good quality back bacon, diced', '2 large potatoes, peeled and cubed', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '225ml (8 fl oz) chicken stock, or as needed', 'salt and black pepper to taste', '150g (5 oz) thinly sliced dark green Savoy cabbage leaves']
